attributes.action: Stop the unfair cuts to carer's allowance
attributes.additional_details: According to a report in the BBC, thousands of carer's in the U.K are set to lose their weekly allowance, this would leave an untold amount of severely disabled people in lives of misery, not to mention parents and those that care them unable to provide the service such  people desperately need, we, the people believe it is a moral obligation to support the weak in society and if bankers and high ranking corporates can award themselves with large bonuses and evade tax, then how much more immoral it becomes
